text: The men's 4 × 400 metres relay event at the 2019 Summer Universiade was held on 12 and 13 July at the Stadio San Paolo in Naples. ==Medalists== {| |- |width=200 valign=top|' Fernando Arodi Vega José Ricardo Jiménez Édgar Ramírez Valente Mendoza |width=200 valign=top|' Gardeo Isaacs Zakhithi Nene Kefilwe Mogawane Sokwakhana Zazini Jon Seeliger* |width=200 valign=top|' Wiktor Suwara Dariusz Kowaluk Kajetan Duszyński Patryk Dobek Patryk Adamczyk* |} *Athletes who competed in heats only ==Results== ===Heats=== Qualification: First 2 teams in each heat (Q) and the next 2 fastest (q) qualified for the final.Heats results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;font-size:95%" |- !Rank !!
